mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC) AS NO, ITEM_NO, SELLER_ID, TYPE, TO_CHAR(ADD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ADD_TIME, TITLE, PRICE, STOCK, PIC FROM ITEM WHERE SELLER_ID = #{seller_id} ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM(ITEM_NO, SELLER_ID, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, CONTENT_D, PRICE, STOCK, PIC, PIC_D) VALUES( ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{seller_id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{content_d}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{pic}, #{pic_d} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ITEM SET
PIC = #{pic},
PIC_D = #{pic_d},
ADD_TIME = LOCALTIMESTAMP, TYPE = #{type}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, CONTENT_D = #{content_d}, PRICE = #{price}, STOCK = #{stock} WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
